title: iOS 15.5 beta blocks ‘Sensitive Locations’ for Memories in Photos app
content:
Apple today released the third beta of iOS 15.5 to developers, and while the update doesn’t seem to have any significant changes, Apple has made an interesting tweak to its native Photos app. The system will now block “Sensitive Locations” for Memories in the Photos app.

more…

The post iOS 15.5 beta blocks ‘Sensitive Locations’ for Memories in Photos app appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has made an interesting tweak to its native Photos app. iOS 15.5 beta now blocks Sensitive Locations for Photo Memories.
